string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Maple Idol Star#n(Special Title)\n#kWho is the most beloved Mapler? The Monk of Honor, Dalair, said this person will be given the #e#bMaple Idol Star#k#n title.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Maple Idol Star#n(Special Title)\n\n#k - Popularity : #b#jpop##k

#b#eTitle Challenge - Maple Idol Star#n(Special Title)

#k - Popularity : #b#jpop##k 

'#bMaple Idol Star#k, the title that is given to the most popular person in Maple World'... Dalair said you have to have a good strategy in order to claim this title which you can only try out for once a month.
